casebody.data:
655 A.2d 504 William PETRAS, Appellant, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (USX CORPORATION). Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Argued March 7, 1995. Decided March 28, 1995. Daniel K. Bricmont, Caroselli, Spagnolli & Beachler, Pittsburgh, for appellant. Martha R. Conley, William J. McKim, Pittsburgh, for USX Corp.

Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

ORDER

PER CURIAM:

Order affirmed.

*47CAPPY, J., dissents.

MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
